movies.title: Rush Hour 2
movies.plot: Carter and Lee head to Hong Kong for a vacation, but become embroiled in a counterfeit money scam

movies.title: Starship Troopers
movies.plot: Humans in a fascist, militaristic future wage war with giant alien bugs.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

movies.title: Jingle All the Way
movies.plot: A father vows to get his son a Turbo Man action figure for Christmas. However, every store is sold out, and he must travel all over town and compete with everybody else in order to find one.

movies.title: Citizen Kane
movies.plot: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

movies.title: Prisoners
movies.plot: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts.

movies.title: Outlaw King
movies.plot: A true David vs. Goliath story of how the 14th century Scottish 'Outlaw King' Robert the Bruce used cunning and bravery to defeat the much larger and better equipped occupying English army.

movies.title: Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
movies.plot: A faded television actor and his stunt double strive to achieve fame and success in the final years of Hollywood's Golden Age in 1969 Los Angeles.

movies.title: Cloverfield
movies.comment: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.comment: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

movies.title: Orphan
movies.comment: A husband and wife who recently lost their baby adopt a 9-year-old girl who is not nearly as innocent as she appears.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.comment: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
